bill_profile.bill_title: American Job Creation and Economic Growth
bill_profile.bill_summary: Increases American job creation and economic growth by improving access to the public capital markets for emerging growth companies; relates to initial public offerings of such companies; exempts such companies from executive compensation reporting; limits the number of years of audited financial statements that must be submitted for an initial public offering registration.
